page.title: 19Services in Langtoft 3
page.content: Mr and Mrs Whitley run{Malton Gate {Stores.}Their shop is at the bottom of Church Lane.At the back of the shop is the house they live in.They sell sweets,frozen food and soap. They open at 8.00 and close at 5.30 with a hour for lunch. You can go to the{Pub,the Ship,}and have great fun.They open for lunch meals at 12.00 noon until 11.00 at night.There is a garden at the back where children can play.They give Bed and Breakfast. {The Old Mill}is a Restaurant at the top of Scarborough road.You can book a table at anytime.They offer 3 course meals.The people who own it are called Mr. and Mrs.Pentland.
